com.model

Interface RestoDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestoDaoImpl

    public interface RestoDao
    RestoDao is class giving the representation of a restaurant It have a group of method for restaurant. In this class we define all the method that shall be implemented.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    team MyVegetable
